import React from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import styles from './card.module.css' import withState from '../hoc/withState' import * as Action from '../../redux/actions' const Card = ({ price, name, previewUrl, id, store }) => { function addProduct() { store.dispatch(Action.addProduct({ count: 1, id, price, name, previewUrl })) } return (

{name}

${price}

) } export default withState(Card)
